title: Parcel Management System
description: A comprehensive full-stack parcel tracking application that allows users to send, track, and manage parcels in real time. The platform integrates payment gateway functionality for seamless transactions and provides instant updates on delivery status through a live tracking system. Admins can manage parcel requests, delivery personnel, and user queries, making the entire process more efficient and transparent.
features: Real-time parcel tracking with live updates
Payment gateway integration for secure transactions
Role-based authentication for users and admins
Parcel status management with automated notifications
Responsive and mobile-friendly UI

title: Recipe Booking Website
description: A dynamic recipe-sharing and booking platform designed for food lovers worldwide. Users can explore recipes, add their own, update details, and even delete them when needed. Each recipe allows interactive features such as likes and comments, enabling community engagement. The platform supports secure authentication and an intuitive search system to help users quickly find their favorite dishes.
features: Add, update, and delete recipes with ease
User authentication and profile management
Interactive likes and comments system
Search and filter recipes by category or name
Responsive design for all devices

title: Lawyer Booking Application (Law BD)
description: Law BD is a Bangladeshi lawyer booking web application that connects clients with verified lawyers based on availability. Users can browse lawyer profiles, schedule meetings, and cancel appointments with ease. Upcoming updates include a role-based registration system, secure payment methods for lawyer fees, and advanced filtering to find the right legal expert. This platform aims to make legal services more accessible and organized.
features: Browse and filter lawyers by expertise and availability
Book and cancel appointments in real time
Profile details with contact and experience information
Secure authentication for clients and lawyers
Scalable structure for future payment integration

title: Study Mate
description: Study Mate is a productivity-focused online platform that helps students find study partners, join challenges, and stay engaged in academic activities. Users can create tasks, join others' tasks, and keep track of their study progress. The platform fosters a distraction-free environment designed to maximize productivity and build a supportive academic community.
features: Create, join, and manage study tasks
Find and connect with study partners
Track progress with task completion status
Secure login and user profiles
Optimized UI for distraction-free study sessions
